metadata.description: Comprehensive persona toolset analysis for competitive positioning
metadata.purpose: Extract full feature list, workflows, and integrations for market comparison
metadata.scope: All personas, tools, UI components, workflows, data flows, and integration gaps

families_aspiring.name: Families - Aspiring Wealth

tools.name: Retirement Planning Calculator
tools.description: Monte Carlo retirement projections with goal tracking
data_integrations: Plaid API for real-time account balances
tools.workflow: Account linking → Risk assessment → Goal setting → Projection calculation → Scenario analysis → Progress monitoring

tools.name: Wealth Vault Document Management
tools.description: Secure document storage with AI categorization
tools.workflow: Document upload → AI categorization → Consent capture → Professional sharing → Version control → Access management

tools.name: Required Minimum Distribution Calculator
tools.workflow: Account aggregation → Age verification → RMD calculation → Tax analysis → Distribution planning → Compliance monitoring

tools.name: Social Security Optimization
tools.workflow: Earnings history → Benefit estimation → Claiming strategy analysis → Spousal coordination → Tax impact review → Optimal timing recommendation

tools.name: Roth Conversion Ladder
tools.workflow: Income projection → Tax bracket analysis → Conversion planning → Healthcare impact → Estate planning → Implementation timeline

tools.name: Tax Planning Hub
tools.description: DIY tax planning with professional review
tools.workflow: Tax situation analysis → Strategy identification → Professional review → Implementation planning → Quarterly monitoring → Filing preparation

workflow_patterns: Financial assessment → Goal setting → Tool selection → Implementation tracking → Professional consultation
Document upload → AI categorization → Consent capture → Professional sharing → Version control
Tax planning → Strategy selection → Professional review → Implementation → Monitoring
families_aspiring.data_flow: Plaid account data → Financial analysis → Risk assessment → Goal calibration → Tool recommendations → Progress tracking → Professional consultation triggers

integration_points.financial_data: Plaid API for account aggregation and transaction categorization
integration_points.payments: Stripe for subscription management and professional service payments
integration_points.documents: DocuSign for signature workflows and professional document sharing
integration_points.communications: Twilio for SMS/email notifications and appointment reminders
integration_points.ai_services: OpenAI for document categorization and recommendation engines
